department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology
department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程

goal.en: “To help students to develop abilities for solving technical problems regarding to spatial information by using programming skills, including numerical analysis, spatial data exploration and application.“
goal.ch: 使用程式語言及數值分析方法處理、分析空間資訊，並能加以應用。本課程旨在培養學生解決專業空間資訊問題的能力。

content.en: “Basic numerical methods, spatial statistics, spatial interpolation, numerical simulation and algorithm design.“
content.ch: 基本數值方法、空間資料統計分析、空間推估、數值模擬及演算法。

method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗

grading.ch: “實習與作業: 60％ 期末報告: 30％ 課堂參與: 10％“

office_hr.en: contact teacher via email in advance.

domain.en: 空間資訊 、 遙測科技
domain.ch: 空間資訊 、 遙測科技

en.competency: Professional competence in remote sensing and geoinformatics
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Assignments ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments
Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment
Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment
Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)
Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)

ch.competency: 遙測與空間資訊專業能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗
口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 自我評量/同儕互評
